notes: Core health monitoring - runs every 5 minutes with Redis lock
System resource monitoring - runs every minute with Redis lock
Database cleanup - runs every hour with Redis lock
Individual provider probing - runs every 10 minutes with Redis lock
Heavy ML reporting task - should be moved to APScheduler
Duplicate of APScheduler probe_all_providers_job - causes conflicts
Duplicate of APScheduler probe_single_provider_job - causes conflicts
Disabled by SKIP_PROBE_INIT - replaced by APScheduler
Simple async tasks - can be replaced with APScheduler if needed</content>
